Package org.jtool.slice

Class SliceCriterion

java.lang.Object
org.jtool.slice.SliceCriterion
public class SliceCriterion
extends java.lang.Object
An object that represents a slicing criterion.

    • find

      public static SliceCriterion find​(CommonPDG pdg, java.lang.String code, int lineNumber, int columnNumber)
      Finds the slicing criterion on a given PDG at a given position at its source code.
      Parameters:
      pdg - the PDG to be sliced
      code - the contents of the source code for the PDG
      lineNumber - the line number of the location where a variable of interest
      columnNumber - the column number of the location where a variable of interest
      Returns:
      the slicing criterion

    • find

      public static SliceCriterion find​(CommonPDG pdg, org.eclipse.jdt.core.dom.ASTNode node)
      Finds the slicing criterion on a given PDG at a given position at its source code.
      Parameters:
      pdg - the PDG to be sliced
      node - the AST node for a variable of interest on the source code for the PDG
      Returns:
      the slicing criterion
